replies.text: You can let me know if you want to add or complete a task.
replies.speak: You can let me know if you want to add or complete a task.

replies.text: Do you want me to read out more from your list?
replies.speak: Do you want me to read out more from your list?

replies.text: Do you want me to read out the next {taskCount}?
replies.speak: Do you want me to read out the next {taskCount}?

replies.text: It seems you have no tasks in your {listType} list. Just let me know if you want to create a new task.
replies.speak: It seems you have no tasks in your {listType} list. Just let me know if you want to create a new task.

replies.text: Alright, I am able to create a new task for you. I can also complete or delete a task. Just let me know if you want to take any action.
replies.speak: Alright, I am able to create a new task for you. I can also complete or delete a task. Just let me know if you want to take any action.
